evidence: Single package structure with minimal directory depth (max 2)
Small number of files (5 files analyzed)
Presence of __main__.py indicating CLI entry point
Simple module structure with core functionality in deletetweets.py
Direct procedural code organization with class wrappers
Testing approach focused on unit testing individual functions/classes
Low fan-out average (2.8) indicating limited inter-module dependencies
risks: Tight coupling between Twitter API and business logic
No clear separation of concerns beyond basic module organization
